name: Merchant Captain
description: The Merchant Captain is a charismatic humanoid skilled in negotiation, with a sharp tongue and quick wits. They wield a rapier and use clever quips to inflict psychic damage.
memorable: The ability to confound foes with Fast Talk and inspire allies demonstrates strategic mastery.
goals: To lead, support allies, and manipulate situations for advantageous outcomes.
relations: May interact with merchants, sailors, and adventurers; often leads a crew or party.
environment: Commonly found in bustling marketplaces, aboard ships, or in social gathering spots.
strengths: Exceptional Charisma allows for effective spellcasting and high persuasion; strong agility.
weaknesses: Low Strength may make them vulnerable in direct physical combats.
attacks: Employs a rapier for close combat and uses psychic damage from verbal quips.
most_powerful_ability: Fast Talk, which can severely hinder opponents' effectiveness in battle.
equipment: Carries a rapier and wears studded leather armor for better agility.
senses: Passive Perception of 14 reflects attentiveness to surroundings.
skills: Possesses proficiency in Dexterity saving throws and strong Charisma saving throws.
additional_information: Can use Inspiration to aid allies' rolls.
Has a variety of useful spells for versatility.
Capable of manipulating the battlefield using charm and tactics.
Excels in both combat and social interactions.
Has a Multiattack feature combining physical and spell attacks.
spellcasting: Utilizes Charisma for spellcasting, including support and utility spells.
test_queries: merchant captain skilled in negotiation and combat
humanoid that uses psychic quips in battle
merchant captain able to inspire allies
